general_features.title: General Features
general_features.description: The Legend u-PVC Window and Door System is designed with a 6-chamber profile and an installation width of 80 mm. The system has been engineered with high performance criteria in mind; profiles are formed by combining the most suitable structural elements. During the design process, window performance such as insulation (thermal and acoustic), structural strength and sealing have been evaluated holistically together with the profile geometry. All profiles in the system are manufactured in accordance with EN 12608-1.

meta.title: Slimslide System
meta.description: Ultra-slim profiles maximizing glass area with smooth sliding operation and minimal sightlines.

page_header.title: Slimslide
page_header.description: Minimal sightlines with smooth sliding, sealing and comfort.

general_features.title: General Features
general_features.description: Slimslide is a slim-frame u-PVC sliding system with near-half center mullion width, zero-threshold option and barrier-free views and passage. The system's distinguishing feature is the exceptionally narrow 23 mm center mullion, creating a sleek appearance with maximum glass area. Slimslide combines aesthetic appeal with functional performance, offering smooth operation and excellent sealing properties. The system is designed for modern architectural applications where minimal frame visibility and maximum transparency are priorities.

meta.title: Legend Sliding Plus
meta.description: Advanced sliding system with enhanced sealing and thermal efficiency for large openings.

page_header.title: Legend Sliding Plus
page_header.description: Premium sliding performance engineered for comfort, sealing and durability.

general_features.title: General Features
general_features.description: The Deceuninck Legend Sliding Plus Window & Door System delivers superior acoustic and air insulation, providing strong protection against cold in winter and heat in summer. Its standout qualities are the elegant design and effortless operation that enhance everyday comfort. With 76 mm system width and a 5‑chamber sash, Legend Sliding Plus offers high performance, powerful isolation and exceptionally easy use. Compared to typical sliding systems, it targets significantly better air tightness and supports glazing up to 52 mm. Design registration applications have been filed with the Turkish Patent and Trademark Office.

page_header.description: Premium sliding performance engineered for comfort, sealing and durability.

general_features.title: General Features
general_features.description: The PVC Sliding Door System is a versatile sliding window and door solution designed for modern architectural applications. This system features configurable tracks, high-quality TPE gaskets, and PCE glazing beads for superior sealing and weather resistance. Compatible with Legend Art and Zendow profiles, it offers flexibility in design while maintaining excellent performance standards. The system provides smooth sliding operation, enhanced thermal efficiency, and reliable long-term performance for both residential and commercial projects.
